New Records: Tarik Skubal recorded his 200th strikeout of the season
Key Match Events: Tarik Skubal pitched a career-high eight innings and struck out Ceddanne Rafaela with a 99-mph fastball on his 98th pitch
Jake Rogers pounced on a bunt attempt and threw out speedy Rafaela by two steps in the third inning
Riley Greene threw out Romy Gonzalez at second base after he tried to stretch a single into a double leading off the second inning
Trey Sweeney and Zach McKinstry turned an improbable double play on a high-chopper by Triston Casas in the fifth
Matt Kreidler fielded a ball behind the bag at third and fired a bullet across the diamond to retire Casas leading off the eighth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The game was celebrated as the 40-year anniversary of the 1984 World Series championship
The crowd of 34,355 gave Skubal standing ovations after both the seventh and eighth innings
Post-Match Reflections: Spencer Torkelson praised Skubal for his conviction and intent
AJ Hinch noted Skubal's efficiency and dominance
Skubal emphasized the importance of getting the first batter out in each inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers scored two runs in the second inning with McKinstry's double extending his hitting streak to 11 games
The game was part of a series where the Tigers are 19-8 when Skubal pitches
